processes.name: Github Create Repo Webhook
processes.description: In this method of GitHub plugin , a repository webhook will create that will trigger as soon as there will be any change in the source code in that repository.

processes.name: CodeBuild Create Project
processes.description: AWS CodeBuild plugin will build the project and it is  a fully managed continuous integration service that compiles source code, runs tests, and produces software packages that are ready to deploy.

processes.name: AWS CodePipeline JSON
processes.description: This plugin will help to create the AWS CodePipeline from JSON file.

processes.name: Slack Notification
processes.description: Slack plugin will integrate the pipeline and slack software which will be helpful for communication.

processes.name: S3 Bucket Create
processes.description: This Amazon-AWS-S3 plugin  will create a new S3 bucket that will store all the files of the application.

processes.name: S3 Enable Versioning
processes.description: This method will enable the versioning of the bucket that can be used to preserve, retrieve, and restore every version of every object stored in your Amazon S3 bucket.

processes.name: S3 Policy
processes.description:
A bucket policy can be used to grant access permissions to bucket and the objects in it. 
This policy will grant public read access for the website.

processes.name: S3 Bucket Store
processes.description: This method will create a new AWS S3 bucket that will store all the source files of the application  and this bucket also store the artifacts of the AWS CodeBuild.

processes.name: S3 Enable Static Website Hosting
processes.description: This Amazon-AWS-S3 plugin will  enable the bucket to host a website and configures a bucket as a static website.
